TEXT.English: An esteemed warlord who operates from the castle in %s2_city has offered to set up a special military academy at his own expense.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city的一位军事首领提议由他出资创办一所军事学院。

TEXT.English: Alright, try limited tests, but only on non-essential citizens.
TEXT.Chinese: 针对少部分人群进行有限度的临床试验。

TEXT.English: This grand achievement has won admiration from people across the globe!
TEXT.Chinese: 这一英雄壮举赢得了全世界人民的赞誉！

TEXT.English: This substance must be studied to see how we might make use of it.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们要好好研究一下这种液体，看看能用它来做些什么。

TEXT.English: With the establishment of our own Trading Company, our country's merchants are approaching you to take action to further assert their position in the South Asian markets.
TEXT.Chinese: 随着我们贸易公司的建立，我们国家的商人正根据你的意图采取行动，以便进一步巩固在南亚市场的地位。

TEXT.English: Send well wishes and a token wedding gift, trying not to further anger our neighbors.
TEXT.Chinese: 送上美好的祝福和象征性的礼物，尝试不再激怒邻国。

TEXT.English: It's a valid point, our clerics need more influence.
TEXT.Chinese: 有点道理，神职人员应该获得更大的权力。

TEXT.English: Receive a Great Prophet.
TEXT.Chinese: 赠送一位大预言家。

TEXT.English: A grocer in %s2_city has struck a deal with rural farmers who live outside the normal range of business of any major city.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city的一位杂货商与远郊区的农民签订了一份收购协议。

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective cities have built enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Arenas[COLOR_REVERT] to complete the National Sports League quest, strengthening their social fabric and their national identity.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective通过建造足够数量的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]竞技场[COLOR_REVERT]胜利完成了“国家体育联合会”任务，增强社会凝聚力和民族认同感。

TEXT.English: We are glad to see that the local culture is thriving.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们很高兴看到当地文化的繁荣。

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective people have trained the largest force of lancers. Advisors across the known world tremble at the thought of facing rows of lances powered by the thundering hooves of a full battle charge.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective建立了一支强大的骑士部队。各国统治者一想到他们将要面对隆隆的铁蹄、密集的长枪巨大的冲击力都会感到颤栗不已。

TEXT.English: Our weapon masters have devised a halberd design that remains fully effective versus mounted units but will boost effectiveness versus foot soldiers.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的武器工匠设计了一种新式长戟，这种新武器不但保持了对骑兵的优势，还增强了对抗步兵的能力。

TEXT.English: Your people are inspired by the way in which you have honored your faith.
TEXT.Chinese: 我国人民因你光大了我们的信仰而备受鼓舞。

TEXT.English: Locals have figured out a way to obtain a higher yield of black pearls. They are guarding their secret with great care.
TEXT.Chinese: 当地居民找到了大规模养殖黑珍珠的方法，他们小心保守着这个秘密。

TEXT.English: A master bowyer has crafted a bow design that works particularly well with our native wood.
TEXT.Chinese: 一位制弓大师改进了弓弩设计，使我们可以用便宜的本国木材大量生产良弓。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Receive [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%D1[COLOR_REVERT] attitude from all leaders
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]所有领袖的外交态度[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%D1[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Let the free market make use of these techniques.
TEXT.Chinese: 在市场经济中运用这些新调控手段。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective plow sales are booming.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective出产的犁在市场上大量销售。

TEXT.English: Repair the dam and provide compensation to the affected families.
TEXT.Chinese: 立即修复大堤并向灾民发放救济金。

TEXT.English: Certain rare insects found near %s2_city, when harvested and ground into a paste by a reclusive tribe, can be ingested to reduce fever.
TEXT.Chinese: 在%s2_city附近发现了一种稀有昆虫，当地部落居民将其碾成糊状服用以治疗热病。

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective Empire has begun construction of a modern national highway network that shall be the envy of the world.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective开始兴建令全世界羡慕的现代化国家公路网。

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective metropolis of %s2_city has constructed a mass transit marvel: an underground railroad network. They are calling it the Subway.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective%s2_city这座现代化大都市完成了宏伟地下轨道公共交通网络，人们称之为“地铁”。

TEXT.English: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. The Goths have gathered an army and their axemen seek to plunder civilizations.
TEXT.Chinese: 蛮族开始大举入侵！哥特人集结了庞大的军队，用他们手中的利斧掠夺各个文明国度的财富。

TEXT.English: Preserve these works as a cultural treasure.
TEXT.Chinese: 秘密保存这一文化宝库。

TEXT.English: Tragedy has struck near %s2_city as a village fire spread to the forest, scarring the land for miles.
TEXT.Chinese: 悲剧降临了%s2_city，一场小火灾蔓延到了附近的森林，大片绿地化为焦土。

TEXT.English: Silk dresses have become the latest fashion, sweeping the nation thanks to radio advertising.
TEXT.Chinese: 在媒体广告的大力宣传下，丝绸服装已成为社会各阶层的流行时尚。

TEXT.English: Inspired %s3_religion_adjective missionaries from the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city have greatly expanded the influence of their religion!
TEXT.Chinese: 来自%s1_civ_adjective的%s2_city的%s4_religion_adjective传教士迅速拓展了他们宗教的影响力！

TEXT.English: Our horses are trained to be more productive on the farm.
TEXT.Chinese: 经过我们训练的马匹能够更快地繁育。

TEXT.English: Our %s1_civ_adjective religious brothers have gifted us with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ivory[COLOR_REVERT] to aid us in our war effort!
TEXT.Chinese: 同我们一样信奉%s1_civ_adjective的兄弟之邦提供了[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]象牙[COLOR_REVERT]资源以资助我们的战争！

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective miners have struck it rich with the discovery of new veins of Silver ore.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的探矿者因找到了一处银矿而大发横财。

TEXT.English: Cash in on our success!
TEXT.Chinese: 让我们享受胜利果实吧！

TEXT.English: We are likely to take the worst of the barbarian horde's fury.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们正面临蛮族部落的大举入侵。

TEXT.English: National Sports League[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your cultural advisors to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Arenas[COLOR_REVERT] to support viable sports leagues.
TEXT.Chinese: “国家体育联合会”任务[PARAGRAPH:1]你的文化顾问提议建造足够数量的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]竞技场[COLOR_REVERT]以举办各种体育赛事。

TEXT.English: A minor earthquake near %s2_city has caused the collapse of a nearby mine. Trapped miners have perished by the hundreds.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city附近发生了一场地震，造成附近矿井坍塌，有数以百计的矿工遇难。

TEXT.English: Stall them for time while your own team learns what it can first.
TEXT.Chinese: 阻挠对方救援队的行动，让我们的人先进行调查。

TEXT.English: The well-protected %s1_civ_adjective citizens endure paying a Security Tax to help maintain their city walls and guards.
TEXT.Chinese: 获得良好保护的%s1_civ_adjective居民被迫额外交纳“安全税”，用于维护城墙及供养守卫。

TEXT.English: Our ability to manufacture large amounts of gunpowder should prove lucrative.
TEXT.Chinese: 规模化的火药生产有利于国家。

TEXT.English: A cache of ancient writings has been discovered hidden away in a cubby hole in a monastery in %s2_city!
TEXT.Chinese: 在%s2_city修道院地下的隐秘洞穴里发现了一批古籍。

TEXT.English: Sailors have spotted a new population of whales.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的水手在海上发现大量鲸鱼。

TEXT.English: A heroic gesture of mercy by the %s3_civ_adjective forces toward the %s1_civ_adjective wounded has brought an unexpected opportunity for peace. The two sides are at least pausing to consider the possibility.
TEXT.Chinese: %s3_civ_adjective军队对俘获的%s1_civ_adjective伤兵的善意举动带来了意外的和平机会，双方已准备进行停火谈判。

TEXT.English: We have no need of his services. Ask him instead to donate his money to the state.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们不需要军事学院，让他直接把钱捐给国家。

TEXT.English: A pilot from %s2_city has become the first to fly solo over the North Pole and return safely.
TEXT.Chinese: 来自%s2_city的一位飞行员首次独自飞越北极并安全返回。

TEXT.English: That sounds like welcome news for our economy.
TEXT.Chinese: 这对我们的经济来说是个好消息。

TEXT.English: Tamers have figured out how to domesticate the abundant supply of prairie dogs on the open range. They are now selling these as pets.
TEXT.Chinese: 草原居民大量驯养土拨鼠，并作为宠物销售。

TEXT.English: Two prominent families are feuding over their children, who eloped together against everybody else's wishes. %s1_civ_adjective leaders are particularly upset that the marriage was held in our %s4_religion_adjective tradition.
TEXT.Chinese: 两个有名望的家族为他们的孩子而发生争执，他们的孩子违背了家长的意愿一起私奔了。%s1_civ_adjective的领袖还因我们坚持按%s4_religion_adjective传统举行婚礼而感到不满。

TEXT.English: Horse Whispering[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your elite trainers to build enough stables for them to transcend the traditional limits of animal husbandry.
TEXT.Chinese: “马语者”任务[PARAGRAPH:1]资深驯马师请你完成一项任务：建造足够数量的马厩，以便他们尝试超越传统理念的新型驯马方法。

TEXT.English: The modern %s2_city Games have begun, with the full richness of the ancient athletic traditions brought back for all the world to enjoy.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city开始举办现代运动会，继承并发扬了古代运动会的传统，令全世界再次感受到体育运动的无限魅力。

TEXT.English: A %s1_civ_adjective spy is operating on a high level in our government! What should we do?
TEXT.Chinese: 一名%s1_civ_adjective间谍渗入了我国政府高层！我们该如何处理？

TEXT.English: Progress sometimes comes more slowly than we would wish.
TEXT.Chinese: 进度有时要比我们想象的慢。

TEXT.English: These Games are honorable, but overall their importance to our civilization is minor.
TEXT.Chinese: 真是一场盛大的赛事，但是未免有些劳民伤财。

TEXT.English: Prairie dogs? This is making us money? That's good, I suppose.
TEXT.Chinese: 土拨鼠也能卖钱？我想这是件好事。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective merchants are offering discounts on barrels of their sour crude oil, which is filled with impurities.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective商人开始倾销劣质原油。

TEXT.English: Leverage our military advantage to collect harsh taxes from our feudal lords and their counties.
TEXT.Chinese: 利用我们的军事优势对下属封国课以重税。

TEXT.English: A gold rush has begun at the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city. Fortune seekers from across the world travel there in hopes of getting rich quickly.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective%s2_city附近发现黄金，世界各地的淘金者蜂拥而至，梦想着一夜暴富。

TEXT.English: Refuse to submit to constitutional rule of law, citing wishful reinterpretations of the constitution or arguments based on passion and principle. Arrive at the desired outcome without heed to the actual constitution.
TEXT.Chinese: 反对机械片面地解读法律，改以符合情理的方式重新解读宪法条文，达成令各方都能接受的结果。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]A dangerous number of barbarian [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Axeman[COLOR_REVERT] units have spawned near our border.
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]大量蛮族[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]斧兵[COLOR_REVERT]出现在我国边境地区。

TEXT.English: Saltpeter Discovered.
TEXT.Chinese: 发现硝石.

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective infrastructure was wiped out by a deadly thunderstorm and the violent twisters it spawned.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的基础设施遭到雷暴和飓风的严重破坏。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective herbalists have discovered a plant that might result in better illness treatment.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的草药医生发现了一种极具治疗效果的药用植物。

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective people have completed the quest of Corporate Expansion. %s6_corporation profits expected to skyrocket.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective完成了“恶意接管”任务，正如预期的那样，%s6_corporation的收益像宇宙火箭般迅速窜升。

TEXT.English: Our ambassador to the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has committed a faux pas!
TEXT.Chinese: 我国驻%s1_civ_adjective大使发生失礼行为！

TEXT.English: Truffles! How delicious. Our people eat richly, do they not?
TEXT.Chinese: 块菌！太美味了。我们的人民难道会不喜欢美食吗？

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective weaponsmiths have invented smokeless powder, giving their musketeers a significant advantage.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的武器工匠发明了无烟火药，使火枪手的战斗力获得提升。

TEXT.English: A great beast has been discovered near one of our hunting camps.
TEXT.Chinese: 某地的猎场附近出现一只巨兽。

TEXT.English: Folklore claims that the Waters of Life may be drawn from a certain oasis. Rumors are spreading that these waters can heal the sick and injured.
TEXT.Chinese: 据传某个绿洲存在一眼能够治病疗伤的“生命之泉”。

TEXT.English: We need a positive publicity campaign for our military, right now!
TEXT.Chinese: 我们必须加强对我国军事力量的正面宣传！

TEXT.English: This heroic deed has inspired our entire army!
TEXT.Chinese: 这件英雄壮举鼓舞了我们全军将士！

TEXT.English: A wealthy family from %s2_city has discovered a cache of lost and rare writings in one of their vaults. They have opted to give these materials to the library.
TEXT.Chinese: 一位%s2_city当地的富豪在密室中找到一批珍贵的手稿，决定将其捐赠给公共图书馆。

TEXT.English: Our government announces the first annual Earth Day to raise awareness of all environmental issues among the populace.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的政府宣布开展一年一度的“地球日”活动，提升公众对环境问题的关注度。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective soldiers and their wives are celebrating the end of war by creating a baby boom.
TEXT.Chinese: 退伍的%s1_civ_adjective战士和他们的妻子努力生养儿女以庆祝战争结束，由此导致了一场婴儿潮。

TEXT.English: Although our brothers are in need, it is best not to get involved at this time.
TEXT.Chinese: 虽然我们的兄弟确实需要帮助，但是此时介入并不明智。

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective people have trained the largest force of arquebus units. Advisors across the known world are panicking at the thought of their nation being ground under the thundering clatter and deadly terror of an endless hail of bullets.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective建立了全世界最强大的火器部队。各国统治者一想到他们将要面对的战火硝烟和枪林弹雨都会感到恐惧不已。

TEXT.English: Our experiments have been a success! Our cities now enjoy better healing herbs!
TEXT.Chinese: 我国医生的临床试验获得了成功！所有国民都将受益于这种新药！

TEXT.English: Commit our government to harvesting this new resource immediately.
TEXT.Chinese: 让政府立即组织开采这处新资源。

TEXT.English: Let the nobles fight amongst themselves. The strongest or cleverest will emerge as the new monarch.
TEXT.Chinese: 任由贵族们互相争斗，让最强者脱颖而出成为新的君主。

TEXT.English: Prospectors have successfully mined newly discovered veins of gold near %s2_city. The news has produced a gold rush.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city附近新发现了一处金矿，引发了一场淘金热。

TEXT.English: We need that food. Do whatever it takes to figure out how to mitigate the erosion of the soil and end the dust storms.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们需要保证粮食供应，采取一切必要手段解决水土流失问题。

TEXT.English: Tragedy has struck near %s2_city as poisonous gases filled a mine and struck down most of the miners who were inside.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city附近的矿井发生了一场悲剧：地下喷出的致命毒瓦斯导致井下矿工几乎全部遇难。

TEXT.English: The %s2_city Games have become a unifying event for all those who are able to participate.
TEXT.Chinese: 在%s2_city举办了一场盛大的综合运动会，大批选手同场竞技，无数观众欢聚一堂。

TEXT.English: A heartrending ballad written by an artist in %s2_city is inspiring cultural pride amongst the %s1_civ_adjective people.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city的一位艺术家创作的一首感人的民谣唤起了%s1_civ_adjective人的文化自豪感。

TEXT.English: We are too pressed to spare any aid.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们很忙，无法提供救助。

TEXT.English: Peace would benefit both sides. Give our blessing to this mediator, and may his words prove sharper than their hatreds.
TEXT.Chinese: 和平对双方都有利，祝福这位调停者，希望他的言辞能战胜仇恨。

TEXT.English: The master's best student will be granted control over his forge when he retires, launching a tradition of metalcasting excellence in that city.
TEXT.Chinese: 一位最优秀的学徒将在煅造大师退休后接管他的煅造场，继续发扬光大当地冶金业的优良传统。

TEXT.English: We can afford a small donation.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们可以提供少量资助。

TEXT.English: Unknown arsonists have torched the Forge in %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: 不明身份的纵火犯烧毁了%s2_city的煅造场。

TEXT.English: A %s1_civ_adjective soldier has run a great distance to warn of invasion, inspiring defenders all across their lands.
TEXT.Chinese: 一名%s1_civ_adjective战士奔跑了漫长的距离带回敌人入侵的警讯，鼓舞了国人的抗战意志。

TEXT.English: The slave revolt in %s2_city continues unabated. The economy there is at a standstill.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city的农民起义有增无减。经济处于停滞状态。

TEXT.English: A wall of water more than fifteen meters high has struck without warning at %s2_city. The tsunami has caused unprecedented destruction!
TEXT.Chinese: 在没有任何先兆的情况下，高达15米的“水墙”袭击了%s2_city，这次海啸造成了空前的破坏。

TEXT.English: The %s1 Trading Company
TEXT.Chinese: %s1贸易公司

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective Empire continues to suffer a loss of food production due to banditry.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的粮食生产由于匪患而遭受严重损失。

TEXT.English: We should make this a national holiday!
TEXT.Chinese: 我们应该使其成为全国性节日！

TEXT.English: Our %s1_civ_adjective religious brothers have gifted us with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oil[COLOR_REVERT] to aid us in our war effort!
TEXT.Chinese: 同我们一样信奉%s1_civ_adjective的兄弟之邦提供了[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]石油[COLOR_REVERT]资源以资助我们的战争！

TEXT.English: The Holy City needs more protection. Recruit and train capable units from among the faithful.
TEXT.Chinese: 圣城需要更好的保护，应该从虔诚的信徒当中征召和训练一批精锐的战士。

TEXT.English: A new source of Whales has been located off the %s1_civ_adjective coast.
TEXT.Chinese: 在%s1_civ_adjective的领海发现了大量鲸鱼。

TEXT.English: This arrangement brings more food to the city? Excellent.
TEXT.Chinese: 这份协议能使城市获得更充足的食物供应？太好了。

TEXT.English: Leverage our defensive advantage in to political capital.
TEXT.Chinese: 利用所获优势提升我们的政治威望。

TEXT.English: Use the leagues to make your people happy.
TEXT.Chinese: 利用体育联赛使人民更加快乐。

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective people in %s2_city have sent half their stored food to your city of %s4_city to fend off starvation caused by a poor local harvest. This humanitarian relief may represent a positive turning point in your relations.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的%s2_city的居民拿出一半粮食储备救助我国遭遇严重饥荒的%s4_city居民。这次无私的人道主义行动也许是两国关系走向全面友好的转折点。

TEXT.English: Our citizenry, fully protected by city walls, have accepted the burden of a Security Tax to help maintain their protection.
TEXT.Chinese: 由于获得新建城墙的良好保护，我们的市民同意额外交纳“安全税”以维护防御系统的运作。

TEXT.English: State religion and most of your cities will change to Protestantism. Catholicism can remain in larger cities. Seizing control of Church assets in Catholic cities is expected to bring %d1 gold to your treasury. If you have founded Protestantism, a shrine will be built in its holy city. Catholic civilizations may declare war on you to stop the Reformation.
TEXT.Chinese: 你的官方信仰及大多数城市的宗教将变为新教。天主教也会在一些大城市中得以保留。没收天主教的教会资产将为你的国库带来%d1金币的收益。如果是你创立了新教，神殿将会在圣城中建立。天主教国家将可能会向你宣战来阻止宗教改革。

TEXT.English: Will offer %d1 gold to our colonists to settle %s2.
TEXT.Chinese: 为我们的殖民者提供%d1金币用来殖民%s2。

TEXT.English: A master smith has developed improved horseshoes, boosting the chance for %s1_civ_adjective mounted units to strike and then escape.
TEXT.Chinese: 一位煅造大师改进了马掌设计，使%s1_civ_adjective骑兵能够更有效地发动奔袭并迅速转移。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_COMMERCE] in %d1 additional [NUM1:plot:plots]
TEXT.Chinese: %d1个区域[ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_COMMERCE]。

TEXT.English: Tamers have figured out how to farm the abundant supply of parrots within one of our tropical forest regions.
TEXT.Chinese: 热带森林地区的居民大量饲养鹦鹉。

TEXT.English: A careless apprentice started a fire at the Forge in %s2_city, during which the facility was destroyed.
TEXT.Chinese: 一个粗心的学徒点燃了%s2_city的煅造场，所有设备都被烧毁了。

TEXT.English: Invention of the banana split by a %s1_civ_adjective businessman has led to booming ice cream sales for their vendors.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective商家发明了“香蕉船”冰淇淋，使得冰激凌销售量大幅增长。

TEXT.English: Computer games? They have no place in our society! Sell the franchise to foreign buyers!
TEXT.Chinese: 电脑游戏？我们的社会不需要这种电子海洛因！把版权卖给外国人吧！

TEXT.English: Buildings have been destroyed.
TEXT.Chinese: 一些建筑被毁

TEXT.English: %s2_city has produced a grand master blacksmith who has overseen the expansion and upgrade of the Forge to increase its efficiency.
TEXT.Chinese: 在%s2_city，一位煅造大师改进了熔炉设计，提高了生产效率。

TEXT.English: That is an act of war! Clearly, our people and military contractors will rise to the occasion!
TEXT.Chinese: 这是战争行径！显然我们的人民——还有我们的军火商应该作出最强烈的反应！

TEXT.English: Criminal activity has disrupted food production in a farming region outside %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city周边盗匪肆虐，扰乱了粮食生产。

TEXT.English: We will utilize the improved shoes for all of our mounted units.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们将在骑兵部队中推广新型马掌。

TEXT.English: During the Toxcatl feast, the young man who is Tezcatlipoca's likeness has escaped from the teokalli in %s2_city before he could be sacrificed!
TEXT.Chinese: 托克斯卡特尔祭礼上，一名被特兹凯里波卡神选定的年轻人在被献祭之前挣脱锁链逃出了%s2_city！

TEXT.English: Our %s1_civ_adjective religious brothers have gifted us with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] to aid us in our war effort!
TEXT.Chinese: 同我们一样信奉%s1_civ_adjective的兄弟之邦提供了[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铁[COLOR_REVERT]资源以资助我们的战争！

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Galley[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units].[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization has built [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you arrive at the Middle Ages without having met the conditions.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]要完成这项任务，你必须训练%d1个[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]三层桨战船[COLOR_REVERT]单位。[PARAGRAPH:1]如果你的文明建造了[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT]，将可以获得一个额外奖励选项。[PARAGRAPH:1]如果其他文明率先达成目标，或者当你进入中古时代仍未达成目标，你的任务将宣告失败。

TEXT.English: Repair the dam from our emergency funds.
TEXT.Chinese: 动用应急基金立即修复大堤。

TEXT.English: Election results are so close, they fall within the margin of error typically written off to system inadequacies such as lost or mismarked ballots, hanging chads, or counting errors. With no indisputable way to decipher the true vote count, the election's outcome has been placed in the hands of the courts.
TEXT.Chinese: 大选的票数是如此接近，以至于诸如丢失选票、错涂选票、作废选票、统计错误等情况可能对结果造成直接影响。在存在巨大争议的情况下，只能由宪法法院来作出最终裁定。

TEXT.English: All records of ancient games have been forever lost.
TEXT.Chinese: 古代运动会的相关记载永远失传了。

TEXT.English: A %s1_civ_adjective chef has identified a new and valuable type of spice.
TEXT.Chinese: 一位%s1_civ_adjective的厨师发现了一种珍贵的新香料。

TEXT.English: Civil unrest near %s4_city has led to riots and looting.
TEXT.Chinese: %s4_city附近发生骚乱和抢掠事件。

TEXT.English: Restore order first, then investigate and redress some of the slaves' grievances.
TEXT.Chinese: 先恢复秩序，然后调查农民的不满并进行矫正。

TEXT.English: The glorious city of %s2_city has added an underground railroad network to its mass transit system, greatly boosting commercial traffic.
TEXT.Chinese: 现代化的%s2_city又新增了一种公共交通设施——地铁，极大地促进了城市经济发展。

TEXT.English: Send all of the food stores! Spare no expense to aid our friends!
TEXT.Chinese: 拿出全部的粮食储备，不计代价地帮助我们的朋友！

TEXT.English: Enjoy our Golden Age of Gunpowder.
TEXT.Chinese: 让我们进入“火枪的黄金时代”！

TEXT.English: In the spirit of international cooperation, the city of %s2_city has decided to revive its ancient tradition of the Games, forming this in to a world event.
TEXT.Chinese: 本着国际协作精神，%s2_city决定复兴古代运动会的传统，将现代运动会办成一场世界性的体育盛事。

TEXT.English: A volcanic eruption near %s2_city has devastated the countryside. Fortunately, the %s1_civ_adjective city itself was spared.
TEXT.Chinese: 火山喷发对%s1_civ_adjective的%s2_city周边地区造成严重破坏，城市本身则幸运地逃过此劫。

TEXT.English: Moose herds near %s2_city have grown particularly large. Our hunters have harvested a cache of surplus food.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city附近的驯鹿快速繁衍，当地的猎人收获颇丰。

TEXT.English: Although we will lose up to half their number to exhaustion, desertion and willful refusal to leave the area, we must convince these units to retreat. Have them march to our capital city, where they will reform into units.
TEXT.Chinese: 尽管漫长征途和思乡情绪可能导致大量减员，但我们必须说服他们撤离，并前往首都接受正规化训练。

TEXT.English: What? Find those who spread such nonsense and prosecute them!
TEXT.Chinese: 什么？将那些散布谬论的人绳之以法！

TEXT.English: Their problems are none of our affairs. Tell our operatives to stand down.
TEXT.Chinese: 他们的问题与我们无关，让我们的特工继续潜伏。

TEXT.English: Disperse the writing to our researchers so that we may obtain some immediate benefit.
TEXT.Chinese: 立即将手稿交给学者进行研究。

TEXT.English: Tolerate the heresy, yet reward the faithful with reduced taxes for a while, to send a message.
TEXT.Chinese: 容忍异端，但对坚持正确信仰的人实行减税，以表达我们的态度。

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have trained a large enough force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Lancer[COLOR_REVERT] units. Please choose your reward.
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你！你已经训练了足够数量的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骑士[COLOR_REVERT]单位。请选择你的奖励。

TEXT.English: Donate the money raised to the local temples.
TEXT.Chinese: 将筹集的善款捐献给当地寺庙。

TEXT.English: The theatre patronage will enhance city revenue.
TEXT.Chinese: 剧场赞助商可以增加城市收入。

TEXT.English: The Harbormaster[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your merchant marine industry to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wharfs[COLOR_REVERT] for them to become the undisputed trading kings of the sea. You will also need to build a fleet of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT] to help carry cargo across deep water.
TEXT.Chinese: “港口主管”任务[PARAGRAPH:1]海上贸易商人请你完成一项任务：建造足够数量的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]港口[COLOR_REVERT]使他们能够主导全世界的海上贸易。你还需要建立一支[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]轻帆船[COLOR_REVERT]舰队以提升跨越大洋运送货物的能力。

TEXT.English: Surplus game harvested by hunters near the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city has fueled a minor population boom.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的%s2_city附近的猎人捕获大量野味，增加了食物供给。

TEXT.English: Corporate Expansion[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your corporate leaders to expand the reach of their corporation.
TEXT.Chinese: “商业扩张”任务[PARAGRAPH:1]我国一家公司请求国家支持拓展他们快速拓展业务。

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units]. A source of Iron will be required.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization is operating the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Monarchy[COLOR_REVERT] civic.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you arrive at the Middle Ages without having met the conditions.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]要完成这项任务，你必须训练%d1个[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]剑士[COLOR_REVERT]单位，这需要拥有铁资源。[PARAGRAPH:1]如果你的文明实行[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]世袭制度[COLOR_REVERT]法令，将可以获得一个额外奖励选项。[PARAGRAPH:1]如果其他文明率先达成目标，或者当你进入中古时代仍未达成目标，你的任务将宣告失败。

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT] in your various cities.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if you control the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] if and when this quest is successfully completed.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you reach the Renaissance Era without having met the conditions.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]要完成这项任务，你必须在本国城市建造%d1座[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]图书馆[COLOR_REVERT]。[PARAGRAPH:1]此外，如果你的文明拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大图书馆[COLOR_REVERT]将可以获得一个额外奖励选项。[PARAGRAPH:1]如果其他文明率先达成目标，或者当你进入启蒙时代仍未达成目标，你的任务将宣告失败。

TEXT.English: Tragedy has struck just beyond your border, as the %s1_civ_adjective Empire struggles to feed all its hungry people in %s6_city. Many will die without enough to eat. Should the citizens of %s2_city move to assist them?
TEXT.Chinese: 悲剧在我们的边境发生，虽然%s1_civ_adjective政府尽力赈济%s6_city的饥民，但仍有许多人面临死亡威胁。%s2_city的居民应该努力提供救助吗？

TEXT.English: Diversity is good. Allow these beliefs to spread and be recorded, though convincing our people that it's nothing to fear won't be easy.
TEXT.Chinese: 应该允许百花齐放，允许不同思想自由传播，虽然我们的人民一时还难以改变固有的观念。

TEXT.English: We are unable to assist at this time.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们现在无法提供资助。

TEXT.English: Massive colonies of termites have overrun and destroyed some of our agriculture near %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city附近白蚁泛滥成灾，一些农田被毁。

TEXT.English: A forest fire sparked by lightning has raged across the land near %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: 闪电引发的森林大火在%s2_city附近肆虐。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective entrepreneurs have invented the fast food hamburger joint. Thanks to radio advertising, this phenomenon is spreading rapidly.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的企业家发明了快餐连锁经营模式，通过媒体广告的大力宣传，这种新型商业模式迅速发展。

TEXT.English: That's an overreaction. The President has gotten the message that his administration needs to improve.
TEXT.Chinese: 不必反应过度，既然总统已经认识到了错误。

TEXT.English: Our chemists have developed an improved motor oil that lasts longer and lubricates engines better.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的化学家改进了润滑油的提炼方法，能够大大提升发动机性能。

TEXT.English: Discovery of naturally occurring glass globules has been ignored by %s1_civ_adjective leadership and will pass in to the dustbin of history.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective境内某处发现了大量天然玻璃球，但并未引起国家领导人的重视。

TEXT.English: An archaeological expedition to city ruins near %s2_city has uncovered lost treasures, texts and artifacts.
TEXT.Chinese: 一支探险队在%s2_city附近的废墟中发现了一批珍宝、古籍和艺术品。

TEXT.English: I suppose we can make our Drydocks a more healthy place to work and slightly more productive, then.
TEXT.Chinese: 在所有干船坞推广这项新技术，在减少工业污染的同时增加产能。

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city took a direct hit from a powerful hurricane.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的%s2_city遭遇特大飓风的直接袭击。

TEXT.English: The Chief Executive Officer of %s11_corporation seeks government incentives to better enable his company to expand.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we can assist in spreading his corporation to new cities, profits will skyrocket.
TEXT.Chinese: %s11_corporation的首席执行官请求国家给予优惠政策，鼓励他们快速拓展业务。[PARAGRAPH:1]如果我们能资助该公司将业务拓展到更多城市，其收益将像宇宙火箭般迅速窜升。

TEXT.English: So what? No one is going to escape anyway.
TEXT.Chinese: 开什么玩笑？犯人不可能越狱。

TEXT.English: The Holy Mountain[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your religious leaders to locate, settle near and seize control over the Holy Mountain.
TEXT.Chinese: “圣山”任务[PARAGRAPH:1]宗教领袖要求你去寻找圣山，在附近建立定居点以取得对圣山的控制权。

TEXT.English: Issue shields to our troops as supplies permit.
TEXT.Chinese: 在军队中大量装备塔盾。

TEXT.English: With removal by man of natural predators, the antelope population has grown large enough to serve as a sustained food source.
TEXT.Chinese: 人类活动使食肉动物数量大减，导致羚羊种群迅速繁育，可以用作新的食物资源。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective authorities are rumored to have captured a fugitive fleeing from %s4_civ_adjective justice. No confirmation is available.
TEXT.Chinese: 据传，%s1_civ_adjective当局逮捕了一名遭%s4_civ_adjective政府通缉的逃犯。此事尚未得到确认。

TEXT.English: Inspired %s4_religion_adjective missionaries have spread their influence out of %s2_city. They now seek an audience with you, requesting your assistance in funding additional missions to the %s1_civ_adjective Empire.
TEXT.Chinese: 热忱的%s4_religion_adjective传教士努力将他们的信仰传播到%s2_city以外的地方。他们请求你的接见，希望您资助他在全%s1_civ_adjective的传教活动。

TEXT.English: A powerful cyclone originating in the southern hemisphere has made landfall at %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: 产生于南半球的特大飓风在%s2_city登陆。

TEXT.English: The legend of Forty Thieves is luring treasure hunters and adventure seekers to %s2_civ_adjective lands.
TEXT.Chinese: 四十大盗的传说吸引了大批追求财富和刺激的冒险者涌入%s2_civ_adjective。

TEXT.English: The Overwhelm Doctrine[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your military leaders to construct a fully functional aircraft carrier battle fleet.
TEXT.Chinese: “绝对优势”任务[PARAGRAPH:1]你的海军将领请求建立一个强大的航空母舰战斗群。

TEXT.English: Fund the expansion of the Library to include a new wing housing all of these precious writings.
TEXT.Chinese: 扩建当地图书馆以存放这批手稿。

TEXT.English: Fund a drive to regulate air traffic, improve safety and ensure the viability of commercial air travel.
TEXT.Chinese: 投资加强空中交通管理，保证商业航空旅行的安全。

TEXT.English: One of your passenger airliners has crashed in %s1_civ_adjective territory. They have allowed unrestricted access to your recovery teams, building trust between your two nations.
TEXT.Chinese: 一架我国客机%s1_civ_adjective境内坠毁。对方允许我们的救援队自由前往现场，以在两国间建立互信。

TEXT.English: Extradite the offender back to his homeland.
TEXT.Chinese: 将这名罪犯引渡回国。

TEXT.English: A new art form involving the carving of large blocks of ice has been created in the icy tundra near the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: 一种新的艺术形式――冰雕在%s1_civ_adjective%s2_city的冰天雪地中诞生。

TEXT.English: Our engineers have developed an advanced fighter design that is lighter and carries slightly more fuel, extending its operational range.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的工程师们研制出了一种先进的战斗机，新机型的重量更轻、载油量更多，作战范围因而大大提升。

TEXT.English: Most of the crude oil being pumped from one of our sites is thick with sulfur and other impurities. We are stuck with a source of sour crude!
TEXT.Chinese: 从某个油井中开采出来的原油含有大量硫磺，这种劣质原油已积压了数百万桶。

TEXT.English: Deer proliferate through the forest near %s2_city, allowing our hunters to store up extra meat.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city附近的森林中野鹿数量激增，当地的猎人收获颇丰。

TEXT.English: A politically arranged marriage between one of our noblemen and a woman from a noble %s1_civ_adjective family has collapsed into feuding as the groom backed out of the wedding on the wedding day.
TEXT.Chinese: 一位我国贵族和一位%s1_civ_adjective世家女的政治联姻演最终变成了激烈的国际冲突――因为新郎在结婚当日取消了婚礼。

TEXT.English: A champion unit has emerged from the war games conducted by the %s1_civ_adjective military. This unit is rumored to be the strongest and toughest amongst all their forces.
TEXT.Chinese: 一支作战部队在%s1_civ_adjective参谋部组织的兵棋推演中大获全胜，成为公认的王牌精锐。

TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of The Holy Mountain.
TEXT.Chinese: 你没能完成“圣山”任务。

TEXT.English: The people of %s2_city celebrate as the latest caribou hunting season has brought a rich harvest.
TEXT.Chinese: 由于在狩猎季节中收获颇丰，%s2_city居民举城欢庆。

TEXT.English: A songwriter from %s2_city has gained local and national recognition, strengthening %s1_civ_adjective culture.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city的一位艺术家创作的歌曲广受欢迎，加强了%s1_civ_adjective的文化影响力。

TEXT.English: We could double the cultural value of the theatre by officially sanctioning this artist's works.
TEXT.Chinese: 给予这位艺术家的作品官方保护，剧场可以积累双倍的文化点数。

TEXT.English: A prolific playwright from %s2_city has written a long series of exceptionally popular plays. His home theatre has gained renown.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city的一位杰出剧作家创作的一系列剧本广受欢迎，当地剧场因此名声大振。

TEXT.English: Our eldest scholars have collaborated on an effort to collect, record, and preserve all of our oral traditions and unwritten literature.[PARAGRAPH:1]They require storage space for pottery, stone tablets and other artifacts, as well as special repositories within our cities.
TEXT.Chinese: 许多著名学者正致力于搜集、记录和保存在民间口头流传的历史与文学作品。[PARAGRAPH:1]他们要求在我们的城市中建立专门用于贮藏陶器、石板等古代文物的场所。

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have trained a large enough force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT] units. Please choose your reward.
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你！你已经拥有了一支强大的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]剑士[COLOR_REVERT]部队。请选择你的奖励。

TEXT.English: A %s1_civ_adjective industrial heiress has received a marriage proposal from one of our prominent business tycoons. Their %s4_religion_adjective wedding will occur this year.
TEXT.Chinese: 我国一位显赫的商业大亨已向一家%s1_civ_adjective公司的女继承人求婚。他们遵照%s4_religion_adjective传统的婚礼将在今年举行。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective merchants are now selling domesticated prairie dogs as exotic pets.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective商人开始批量销售作为宠物的土拨鼠。

TEXT.English: A collapsed politically arranged wedding and a jilted bride are at the center of new tensions between the %s4_civ_adjective and %s1_civ_adjective Empires.
TEXT.Chinese: 一位显贵的女儿在一场失败的政治联姻中被抛弃，导致%s4_civ_adjective和%s1_civ_adjective之间关系极度紧张。

TEXT.English: Looks like it could feed many people. Organize a hunting party!
TEXT.Chinese: 它的肉够许多人吃的，马上组织狩猎队！

TEXT.English: Advise him to focus on his relationship with the armed forces.
TEXT.Chinese: 建议他加强对军队的控制。

TEXT.English: The Chief Executive Officer of %s11_corporation covets getting out from under the thumb of foreign suppliers of raw materials.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we can obtain control over all resource types his corporation needs for industrial use, their profits will skyrocket.
TEXT.Chinese: %s11_corporation的首席执行官渴望摆脱受制于外国原材料供应商的状况。[PARAGRAPH:1]如果我们能控制该公司需要的所有资源，其收益将像宇宙火箭般迅速窜升。

TEXT.English: A %s4_civ_adjective passenger aircraft has crashed within %s1_civ_adjective territory. Neither side has provided any details of the incident.
TEXT.Chinese: 一架%s4_civ_adjective客机在%s1_civ_adjective境内坠毁。事件双方均未就此事透露任何细节。

TEXT.English: See if the scientist would be willing to continue the scientific work at the Monastery, given some additional funding.
TEXT.Chinese: 提供资助让这位学者在修道院里继续他的科学研究。

TEXT.English: Round up the broadcasters, that should send a message.
TEXT.Chinese: 派遣警察包围这家电台，如果他们知趣得话应该会放老实点。

TEXT.English: Fund an international awareness effort in addition to our local efforts.
TEXT.Chinese: 拨出专款提升国际社会对环境问题的关注度。

TEXT.English: Our spiritual leaders are urging us to seek the blessings of the sea![PARAGRAPH:1]The wise masters have divined the way regarding our relationship with the sea. They urge us to embrace the sea, to broaden our influence over it and spread our traditions to new lands.
TEXT.Chinese: 宗教领袖催促我们寻找海洋的祝福！[PARAGRAPH:1]睿智的导师指出我们应如何与神圣的海洋友好相处。他们要求我们拥抱海洋，加强我们的海上力量，将我们的贸易拓展到新的陆地。

TEXT.English: We are too pressed to spare any aid for the city.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们太忙了，无法提供额外救助。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective citizens from the city we just razed are taking to the surrounding countryside to form Partisan resistance units!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective人民在被毁城市周围的乡村进行游击战，以抗击入侵者。

TEXT.English: Inspired by religious music and sculpture in %s2_city, a new Great Artist has emerged in the %s1_civ_adjective Empire.
TEXT.Chinese: 在%s2_city宗教音乐和雕塑作品的熏陶下，一位年轻的大艺术家在%s1_civ_adjective崭露头角。

TEXT.English: Send large herds of war-trained Horses to our brothers.
TEXT.Chinese: 向我们的兄弟提供大量马匹。

TEXT.English: Leverage our military advantage into a drive to spread our faith.
TEXT.Chinese: 利用强大的军事优势传播我们的信仰。

TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of The National Sports League.
TEXT.Chinese: 你没能完成“国家体育联合会”任务。

TEXT.English: Our harbormasters request government aid in expanding our overseas trading empire.[PARAGRAPH:1]We will need to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wharfs[COLOR_REVERT] in our cities and construct enough ocean worthy ships.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的港口主管请求政府资助扩张海外贸易。[PARAGRAPH:1]我们需要建造足够数量的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]港口[COLOR_REVERT]和远洋船舶。

TEXT.English: A miracle is believed to have occurred at the city wall in %s2_city. Pilgrims are flocking from all over to visit the new holy site.
TEXT.Chinese: 据报在%s2_city发生了奇迹，大批朝圣者从各地涌向这个新的圣地。

TEXT.English: Vermin have gotten in to the granary in %s2_city. All the food stored there is spoiled.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city的粮仓发生虫害，粮食储备严重受损。

TEXT.English: Our naval commanders wish to prepare for war.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we train enough [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Galley units[COLOR_REVERT], we could dominate the seas!
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的海军将领希望为战争做好准备。[PARAGRAPH:1]如果我们训练了足够数量的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]三层桨战船[COLOR_REVERT]单位，我们就能随心所欲地支配海洋！

TEXT.English: Release the prisoner. This is none of our affairs.
TEXT.Chinese: 将其释放。此事与我们无关。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]A dangerous number of barbarian [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horse Archer[COLOR_REVERT] units have spawned near our border.
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]大量蛮族[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骑射手[COLOR_REVERT]出现在我国边境地区。

TEXT.English: That is very unfortunate, but we can not help. Tell the local authorities they'll have to handle the situation.
TEXT.Chinese: 真是不幸的消息，但是我们帮不上忙。让当地官员自行处理。

TEXT.English: A gladiator from %s2_city has survived many battles in the arena. He is attracting a lot of fans.
TEXT.Chinese: 一位英勇的角斗士在%s2_city赢得了无数场生死角斗的胜利，吸引了大批热情的角斗迷。

TEXT.English: Leaks like these are dangerous. We must invest in modernizing our reactors to keep them safe for the future.
TEXT.Chinese: 像这样的泄漏是危险的。我们必须投资使我们的反应堆现代化，以保证它们在未来的安全。

TEXT.English: Our civilization cries out for nobility to lead our people forward into a brighter future.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we train enough [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Lancers[COLOR_REVERT], we should be able to find our way forward, through times peaceful or warlike.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们需要一个强大的贵族阶层引领人民进入更加光明的未来。[PARAGRAPH:1]如果我们训练了足够数量的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骑士[COLOR_REVERT]单位，那么无论是在平安祥和还是在战火纷飞的年代，我们都能够稳步前进。

TEXT.English: An industrial heiress from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has received a marriage proposal from one of our prominent business tycoons. The marriage is going forward, but the families on both sides are feuding over which religion should preside over the ceremony. The couple has decided on a %s4_religion_adjective wedding to the great annoyance of the bride's family.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective一家企业的女继承人收到我国一位商业大亨的求婚并欣然同意。但双方家族为应按何种宗教传统举行婚礼而各执己见。这对新人决定按%s4_religion_adjective传统举行婚礼以平息新娘家族的不满。

TEXT.English: A rich source of Tin has been discovered in the hills!
TEXT.Chinese: 在山区发现贮量丰富的锡矿！

TEXT.English: That sounds like welcome news for our economy.
TEXT.Chinese: 这个消息有利于我们的经济发展。

TEXT.English: Can we have fries with that? Thanks!
TEXT.Chinese: 来份炸薯条好吗？谢谢！

TEXT.English: Send hearty congratulations and a generous wedding gift.
TEXT.Chinese: 送上衷心的祝福和大方得体的礼物。

TEXT.English: A %s1_civ_adjective passenger flight has crashed in our territory near %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: 一架%s1_civ_adjective客机在我国%s2_city附近坠毁。

TEXT.English: We applaud the accomplishments of our revered grand master blacksmith.
TEXT.Chinese: 表彰煅造大师的杰出成就。

TEXT.English: A blizzard has dumped disastrous quantities of snow upon a %s1_civ_adjective region near %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: 猛烈的暴风雪袭击了%s1_civ_adjective的%s2_city。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective merchants are now selling black pearls in larger quantities.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective商人开始批量销售黑珍珠。

TEXT.English: Send commendations to the leaders of the exploring party.
TEXT.Chinese: 嘉奖探险队的领袖。

TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of the Elite Swordsmen!
TEXT.Chinese: 你没能完成“精锐剑士”任务！

TEXT.English: Outlaw the use of hydrogen in lighter-than-air vehicles.
TEXT.Chinese: 立法禁止空气浮力飞行器使用氢气填充。

TEXT.English: Rely on judicial authority to enforce the letter of the constitution.
TEXT.Chinese: 提交司法裁决，确立现行宪法的绝对权威。

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective Empire is enjoying a population increase at %s2_city thanks to a gold rush bringing in prospectors and hopefuls.
TEXT.Chinese: 由于怀揣发财梦的淘金者大量涌入，%s1_civ_adjective%s2_city的人口迅速增加。

TEXT.English: Monsoon flooding, more severe than usual for %s2_city, has visited disaster upon the %s1_civ_adjective people there.
TEXT.Chinese: 百年一遇的洪水给%s2_city居民带来了巨大灾难。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective diamond ring sales are booming.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的钻戒销售量大幅增长。

TEXT.English: Fund efforts to motivate more of the gold seekers to settle down when the rush ends.
TEXT.Chinese: 最初的热潮消退之后，许多淘金者决定在此定居，长期发展。

TEXT.English: Send what aid we can to the survivors. Be thankful that the city itself was not struck.
TEXT.Chinese: 尽力救助幸存者，幸好城市未被完全摧毁。

TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of the Hostile Takeover!
TEXT.Chinese: 你没能完成“恶意接管”任务！

TEXT.English: A plague of locusts have swarmed over a Pasture near %s2_city, destroying all the livestock there.
TEXT.Chinese: 蝗灾席卷%s2_city附近的牧场，导致大批牲畜饿死。

TEXT.English: Your Crusade has ended. The quest has failed.
TEXT.Chinese: 对异教徒的征讨无果告终，你没能完成“圣战”任务。

TEXT.English: We do not want peace! Let the war continue.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们不需要和平！让战争继续。

TEXT.English: A %s5_religion_adjective wedding between one of our citizens and one from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has drawn a blessing from them with generous wedding gifts. Our people are pleased by this gesture.
TEXT.Chinese: 通过一场%s5_religion_adjective传统婚礼，一位我国显贵和一位%s1_civ_adjective人结为夫妇。有人送上丰厚的礼物以表达对他们的祝福。我们的人民对此表示满意。

TEXT.English: A heretical spiritual movement has started in %s2_city and is gaining strength among some sections of our populace.
TEXT.Chinese: 一个发源于%s2_city的异端信仰开始在我国部分地区散播！

TEXT.English: Our bat herds in the hills near %s2_city, legendary in quantity, are now providing us surplus sources of saltpeter for use in gunpowder.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city附近山洞中生活着数量庞大的蝙蝠，我们可以从山洞中大量采集硝石制造火药。

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have completed the quest of Corporate Expansion and enabled %s11_corporation to turn extra profit.
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你！你已经完成了“商业扩张”任务，使%s11_corporation能够创造更多的利润。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Receive %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horse Archers[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]获得%d1个[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骑射手[COLOR_REVERT]单位。

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must establish or capture cities on %d1 total landmasses of any size, from one-plot islands to massive continents. All landmasses where you have at least one city are counted. Note that additional cities on the same island or continent do not help in this quest. The goal is to establish your presence on a number of different landmasses and thereby prove your mastery over the waters.[PARAGRAPH:1] You will fail this quest if you change state religions, cease to have a state religion or reach [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Industrialism[COLOR_REVERT] without having met the conditions.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]要完成这项任务，你必须在%d1块陆地上建立或占领城市，陆地的大小没有限制，只有一格的小岛或是广阔的大洲都可以。只要你在一块陆地上拥有至少一个城市，这片陆地就会被计算在内。请注意，在同一个海岛或大陆上建立多个城市无助于完成本任务。任务目标是将你的势力扩张到尽可能多的独立陆地上，并由此展现你对海洋的统治能力。[PARAGRAPH:1]如果你改变了国教、不再设立国教或已获得了[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]产业主义[COLOR_REVERT]时目标仍未达成，任务即宣告失败。

TEXT.English: The man who is Tezcatlipoca's likeness has escaped during this year's Toxcatl feast in the %s1_civ_adjective Empire.
TEXT.Chinese: 在%s1_civ_adjective举行的托克斯卡特尔祭礼上，一名特兹凯里波卡神选定的年轻人挣脱锁链逃走了。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective citizens who are socially advanced have adopted imported %s4_civ_adjective tea as their beverage of choice.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective上流社会饮用自%s4_civ_adjective进口的茶饮料已蔚然成风。

TEXT.English: A well-known scientist from %s2_city has become a preacher at the local Christian Monastery.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city的一位著名学者决定到当地修道院的担任宣教师。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective discoveries have turned out to be false! This dead end result has slowed their current research project.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的一项新发现被证明是错误的！研究被迫进度放缓。

TEXT.English: Every man has his price. His knowledge could make him a very valuable asset.
TEXT.Chinese: 国家利益至上。他所掌握的情报也可以成为我们的财富。

TEXT.English: A slave revolt has taken place in the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的%s2_city发生农民起义！

TEXT.English: The Best Defense[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your armed forces to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] for them to ward off invasion effectively.
TEXT.Chinese: “顶级防御”任务[PARAGRAPH:1]军队将领请你完成一项任务：建造足够数量的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]城堡[COLOR_REVERT]以有效地防御敌人入侵。

TEXT.English: Citizens have been killed.
TEXT.Chinese: 许多市民死亡

TEXT.English: The hospital in %s2_city is gaining favor among the pious because it is believed to be blessed by a spirit angel.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city的市立医院受到大批信徒的尊崇，他们相信在那里能得到天使的保佑。

TEXT.English: Look at the Holy Mountain.
TEXT.Chinese: 让我们一起仰望这座神圣的山峰。

TEXT.English: That sounds like welcome news for our economy.
TEXT.Chinese: 这个消息有利于我们的经济发展。

TEXT.English: Commit our government to unlocking the secrets of this mystery.
TEXT.Chinese: 组织专家学者开展深入研究。

TEXT.English: A massive barbarian uprising is occurring. Attila the Hun leads his forces in a crusade against the very concept of civilization.
TEXT.Chinese: 蛮族开始大举入侵！匈人首领阿提拉发动了旨在毁灭文明世界的大规模征伐。

TEXT.English: A %s1_civ_adjective folk hero has caused the creation of a new forest of apple trees.
TEXT.Chinese: 在一位%s1_civ_adjective民间植树英雄的带领下，人们创造了一处繁茂的苹果树林。

TEXT.English: Friendly locals have granted sanctuary to a wounded %s1_civ_adjective unit.
TEXT.Chinese: 一名受伤的%s1_civ_adjective战士获得了友善的当地居民的救助。

TEXT.English: The blacksmith is a true talent, we should encourage him to make more of these statues.
TEXT.Chinese: 真是艺术天才，我们应该鼓励他制作更多的雕像。

TEXT.English: Send congratulations to the citizens.
TEXT.Chinese: 向当地的居民发去祝贺。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]A dangerous number of barbarian [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Archer[COLOR_REVERT] units have spawned near our border.
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]大量蛮族[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]弓手[COLOR_REVERT]出现在我国边境地区。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1[ICON_HAPPY] in all cities with %F3_religion for %d2 [NUM2:turn:turns]
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]所有信仰%F3_religion的城市%D1[ICON_HAPPY]，持续%d2回合

TEXT.English: A community of independent film producers based in %s2_city has managed to secure a slice of the Hit Movies market.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city集中了多家独立电影公司，在世界电影市场上占有极大份额。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective merchants are now selling gunpowder in larger quantities.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective商人开始批量销售火药。

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective people from the city of %s5_city have seen their homes burned! They are rising up against the wicked %s4_civ_adjective invaders, forming Partisan units to join the resistance as militia fighters!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective%s5_city的人民目睹家园被烧毁！他们组织起一支游击队来帮助我们对抗邪恶的%s4_civ_adjective侵略者。

TEXT.English: Decorate our glorious heroes of the sword!
TEXT.Chinese: 为我们光荣的战争英雄授勋！

TEXT.English: The seaworthy %s1_civ_adjective people have completed the quest of The Harbormaster!
TEXT.Chinese: 擅长航海的%s1_civ_adjective人胜利完成了“港口主管”任务！

TEXT.English: That sounds like welcome news for our economy.
TEXT.Chinese: 这个消息有利于我们的经济发展。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Medium risk of a nuclear meltdown.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Radiation leaks may continue.
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]核熔毁的中等风险。[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]辐射泄漏可能继续。

TEXT.English: Criminals are still preying on our farmers. A more stringent response may be necessary in %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的农民仍然遭受盗匪侵害，或许有必要在%s2_city周边采取更严厉的措施。

TEXT.English: A brilliant smith has developed significant innovation in the design of horseshoes.
TEXT.Chinese: 一位煅造大师改进了马掌设计。

TEXT.English: A patron of knowledge from the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city has donated a cache of rare writings to the local Library.
TEXT.Chinese: 在%s1_civ_adjective的%s2_city，一位收藏家向当地图书馆捐赠了一批珍贵的手稿。

TEXT.English: Although %s2_city is used to some flooding during monsoon season, a rare and powerful monsoon has brought devastatingly strong floods this year.
TEXT.Chinese: 尽管%s2_city人已经习惯了河流的季节性泛滥，然而这场洪水威力空前，造成了严重的破坏。

TEXT.English: Recruit and train units that take advantage of our new resources.
TEXT.Chinese: 利用新获得的资源征召和训练部队。

TEXT.English: Let them keep the secret. We are happy enough to tax their higher profits.
TEXT.Chinese: 让他们继续保守秘密吧，我们可以从销售利润中收取税金。

TEXT.English: That is disgusting and preposterous. The heresy must be dealt with in the name of Amun-Re, even if the locals won't support it.
TEXT.Chinese: 这是在哗众取宠。异端分子必须以真神的名义加以铲除，即使当地人反对这样做。

TEXT.English: Pay to have the lost grain replaced.
TEXT.Chinese: 立即出资补充粮食储备。

TEXT.English: Cha-ching! Show me the money!
TEXT.Chinese: 太棒了！让我数数有多少钱。

TEXT.English: Crusade[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your religious leaders to capture and occupy the Holy City.
TEXT.Chinese: “圣战”任务[PARAGRAPH:1]我国早高精神领袖要求使用武力夺取圣城。

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective Empire has become the world's leading producer of tin.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective成为世界产锡大国。

TEXT.English: Convert our musketeers to the new gunpowder.
TEXT.Chinese: 让我们的火枪手换用无烟火药。

TEXT.English: A large order of stained glass has been shipped to %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city地方政府大量购入彩色玻璃。

TEXT.English: A %s1_civ_adjective philosopher has stirred up controversy among the religious population.
TEXT.Chinese: 一位%s1_civ_adjective哲学家提出的新学说在虔诚的教徒中引发了激烈的争议。

TEXT.English: This will attract more traffic to the oasis? That sounds good.
TEXT.Chinese: 这会吸引更多人到那个绿洲吧？听起来很不错。

TEXT.English: A renowned playwright from %s2_city is attracting patrons and fans from far and wide.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city的一位著名剧作家创作的优秀作品吸引了来自各地的赞助商和观众。

TEXT.English: A great mediator has emerged, offering to arbitrate the dispute between %s1_civ_adjective leadership and our nation. This could be a chance for peace.
TEXT.Chinese: 一位中立国领袖主动提出充当调停者，对%s1_civ_adjective与我国之间的争端进行仲裁，这可能是一个和平的机会。

TEXT.English: A massive cyclone has made landfall at the %s1_civ city of %s2_city, causing widespread wind and storm surge damage.
TEXT.Chinese: 特大飓风在%s1_civ的%s2_city登陆，狂风和海浪造成了巨大的破坏。

TEXT.English: Our researchers have made a technological breakthrough, rapidly advancing their progress.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的科学家在技术上取得突破，使得当前研究进度加快。

TEXT.English: One of your passenger airliners has crashed in %s1_civ_adjective territory. They seemed to be unsure how to react at first, but finally allowed your recovery teams access to the crash site.
TEXT.Chinese: 一架我国客机在%s1_civ_adjective境内坠毁。经过一番交涉，对方最终同意我们的救援队前往现场。

TEXT.English: A new breed of race horse is generating a lot of revenue from our stables.
TEXT.Chinese: 一个新赛马品种的成功繁育为我们的马厩带来了一笔额外利润。

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective people have completed the quest of Corporate Expansion. %s6_corporation profits expected to skyrocket.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective完成了“商业扩张”任务，正如预期的那样，%s6_corporation的收益像宇宙火箭般迅速窜升。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective explorers have discovered valuable information buried in ruins near %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective探险队在%s2_city附近发现了埋藏在废墟中的重要资料。

TEXT.English: Elite Swordsmen[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your military leaders to train a sizable force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsmen[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: “精锐剑士”任务[PARAGRAPH:1]你的军事将领请求训练足够数量的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]剑士[COLOR_REVERT]单位。

TEXT.English: A new design of steel boiler is in demand, because it can raise manufacturing productivity.
TEXT.Chinese: 一种新型锅炉在各地广受欢迎，因为它显著提升了生产效率。

TEXT.English: In the sands of a %s2_civ_adjective desert, archaeologists have unearthed a cache of ancient texts.
TEXT.Chinese: 考古学家在%s2_civ_adjective境内的沙漠中发掘出一批古籍。

TEXT.English: We have identified %s1_civ_adjective agents who are systematically and actively aggravating the situation in %s4_city!
TEXT.Chinese: 我们发现有%s1_civ_adjective的间谍在暗中参与%s4_city骚乱！

TEXT.English: We can sell the precious jade for additional profit.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们应该批量销售玉器换取财富。

TEXT.English: The taxes from these sales should boost our coffers nicely, as well as boosting our relations.
TEXT.Chinese: 茶叶贸易增进了两国关系，从中征收的销售税也充实了我们的国库。

TEXT.English: Our library with the largest repository of classic literature receives a research bonus.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们保存着经典文学宝库的图书馆带来了额外的科研奖励。

TEXT.English: Severe winter weather is plaguing the %s1_civ_adjective people near their city of %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的%s2_city遭遇百年一遇的严冬。

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective hereditary dynasty has died out. A new faction has claimed the throne and is off to a roaringly successful start.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective原来的世袭王室已经绝嗣，一个新的派系夺取了统治权并着手稳定局势。

TEXT.English: What if something even bigger is out there, on a collision course with our world? If so, we must find it. We must get into space!
TEXT.Chinese: 是否还有其他更巨大的天体可能撞击地球？必须提前发现及早准备，我们必须登上太空！

TEXT.English: He's a senile old fool. Let him teach if he wants to.
TEXT.Chinese: 他只是个老糊涂虫，不必理会那些胡言乱语。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Spread each of the religions present to a new city
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]将现有的信仰传播到一座新城市。

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must settle near uncontrolled resources or attack rival civilizations and take over their resources.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will need to obtain new sources of %d1 [NUM1:resource type:different resource types] (%s2_list_of_resources).[PARAGRAPH:1]You must also retain control over all needed resource types already owned.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization who is also seeking to obtain control over needed resources for one of its corporations should happen to complete this task ahead of you.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]要完成这项任务，你必须在无主资源所在地建立定居点，或者夺取别国领土以接管其资源。[PARAGRAPH:1]你需要夺取%d1种资源（%s2_list_of_resources）。[PARAGRAPH:1]您还必须保持对已有相关资源的控制权。[PARAGRAPH:1]如果其他文明的公司率先达成控制全部相关资源的目标，你的任务将宣告失败。

TEXT.English: A new plow design has become popular. Our Forges have filled orders for the new plows from farmers across our lands.
TEXT.Chinese: 一种新型的犁在市场上大受欢迎，各地农场主的订单雪片般飞往我们的煅造场。

TEXT.English: Make it so.
TEXT.Chinese: 就这么办。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_religion[COLOR_REVERT] to up to %d2 new [NUM2:city:cities].
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_religion[COLOR_REVERT]到%d2座新的城市。

TEXT.English: Word of our interrogation of the fugitive has leaked to %s3_civ_adjective authorities, angering them.
TEXT.Chinese: %s3_civ_adjective政府已获知对我们逃亡者的进行秘密审问，这势必引发外交纠纷。

TEXT.English: Use our advantage to discover a new source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 利用所获优势发现一处[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铜[COLOR_REVERT]资源。

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_corporation[COLOR_REVERT] to %d2 new cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]要完成这项任务，你必须在%d2座新城市设立[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_corporation[COLOR_REVERT]的分支机构。

TEXT.English: Clunker coal? What a mess. Less valuable per ton, but it still burns, right? Just deal with it.
TEXT.Chinese: 劣质煤炭？真是糟糕，但应该还烧得着吧？允许继续销售。

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective people have trained the largest force of Chariot units. Advisors across the known world are panicking at the thought of their nation being ground under the thundering hooves and churning wheels of these mighty war machines.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective建立了一支强大的战车部队。各国统治者都被这些战争机器的铁蹄和车轮巨大的轰鸣声吓得心慌意乱！

TEXT.English: A new type of rapid-service restaurant selling primarily hamburgers was launched recently. Thanks to successful radio advertising, the chain is now expanding across the nation.
TEXT.Chinese: 一种以销售汉堡为主的新型自助式连锁快餐店在市场上出现，通过媒体广告的大力宣传，这种新型商业模式迅速发展。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective monks who have grown their vinyards over the years are now producing Wines in significant quantities.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的僧侣们努力经营葡萄园，出产了大批美酒。

TEXT.English: Our generals covet a source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s9_resource[COLOR_REVERT] that lies within %s1_civ_adjective borders. Without it, we cannot properly train and equip our troops!
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的将军垂涎于%s1_civ_adjective境内的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s9_resource[COLOR_REVERT]资源。由于缺乏这种资源，我们无法更有效地训练和装备部队！

TEXT.English: Fire ant armies of massive proportion have laid waste to grazing lands near %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: 大群火蚁横扫%s2_city附近地区。

TEXT.English: Do what we can to aid the survivors.
TEXT.Chinese: 尽力救助灾民。

TEXT.English: A songwriter from %s2_city has composed a heartrending ballad, which is growing in popularity amongst the people there.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city的一位艺术家因创作了一首感人的民谣而广受赞誉。

TEXT.English: Emphasize improved safety so that this particular type of accident should never happen again.
TEXT.Chinese: 加强安全措施，避免类似事故再次发生。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective officials in %s2_city have lavishly decorated their public buildings with finely carved marble statues.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective%s2_city地方官员决定使用精美的大理石雕像装饰各大公共建筑。

TEXT.English: You have failed the Quest of Greed!
TEXT.Chinese: 你没有完成“贪婪的欲望”任务！

TEXT.English: Our craftsmen have devised a technique for improving the balance of our axes.
TEXT.Chinese: 我国的工匠改进了斧柄设计，使其威力大大提升。

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization captures %s1_city first, if you change your state religion, or if your war ends for any reason prior to your success.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]如果其他文明率先占领%s1_city，或者你改变了官方信仰，或者在达成目标之前结束战争，你的任务将宣告失败。

TEXT.English: Send well wishes and a token wedding gift.
TEXT.Chinese: 送去美好的祝福和一份象征性的礼物。

TEXT.English: A small tribe of friendly locals have granted sanctuary to our beleaguered %s3_unit.
TEXT.Chinese: 一个友善的当地部落为遭到围攻的我方%s3_unit单位提供了帮助。

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must extend your cultural influence and control over the Peak plot that is the Holy Mountain. You may achieve this by divine providence by settling near any Peaks you find. Eventually you may find the right one.[PARAGRAPH:1]Or you may seek further guidance from studying the holy scriptures. If you build %d3 religious buildings (Temples and Monasteries), your religious leaders will solve the puzzle and identify the correct location of the Holy Mountain, which you must then still go and settle near to complete the quest. A %s2_building allows for more coordinated worship and is worth as much as four Temples for the purposes of this quest.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if you change state religions, cease to have a state religion, or reach [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Industrialism[COLOR_REVERT] without having met the conditions. You will also fail this quest if any other civilization takes control of the Holy Mountain before you do.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]要完成这个任务，你必须扩张你的文化影响并控制圣山主峰所在的地区。你可以在你见到的每个山峰附近建立定居点，这样你就一定能找到真正的圣山。[PARAGRAPH:1]你也可以靠深入研究经文来得到更多启示。如果你建成%d3座宗教建筑（神庙和修道院），你的宗教领袖就能最终确定圣山的位置；在确定的位置建立定居点即可任务。一座%s2_building可以容纳更多信徒开展宗教活动，因此其价值等同于四座神庙。[PARAGRAPH:1]如果你更换了国教、取消了国教或者在获得[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]产业主义[COLOR_REVERT]后仍然没有达成以上条件，任务就将失败。如果其他文明比你先控制了圣山，任务也将失败。

TEXT.English: A %s5_religion_adjective wedding between one of our citizens and one from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has drawn our rivals' blessing with generous wedding gifts. Our people are outraged by this insult to our faith.
TEXT.Chinese: 一位我国显贵同一位%s1_civ_adjective人按%s5_religion_adjective传统举行了婚礼，对方国家为此送来祝福和丰厚的礼物。但他们对我们信仰的侮辱还是引发了国民的公愤。

TEXT.English: Excellent! Have him train Pikeman units for us.
TEXT.Chinese: 太好了！让他为我们训练一批长枪兵。

TEXT.English: Criminals have set fire to the forest near %s2_city in a failed bid to aid their escape from justice.
TEXT.Chinese: 一群罪犯在%s2_city附近的森林里纵火，妄想乘乱逃脱法网。

TEXT.English: Congratulations! Your Crusade to secure the sacred lands of %s2_city has wrested control of the city away from the %s1:2_civ_adjective! Please choose a reward from among the benefits that may accrue from the joy your people feel in this successful Crusade.
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你！你的军队从%s1:2_civ_adjective异教徒手中夺取了圣城%s2_city！这场胜利使人民感到欢欣鼓舞，请在赢得圣战可带来的奖励中选择一项。

TEXT.English: Fund efforts to increase production without endangering the natural resources that produce them.
TEXT.Chinese: 为此项目投入资金，在增加产量同时确保这一自然物种的延续。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Receive %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units].
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]获得%d1个[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT]单位。

TEXT.English: Our city of %s6_city has been destroyed by the rampaging %s1_civ_adjective army. Some of our citizens are forming partisan resistance!
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的城市%s6_city已经被残暴的%s1_civ_adjective军队夷为平地，一些幸存的市民组织起一支游击队！

TEXT.English: Dispatch emergency crews to repair the damage, without heed to cost.
TEXT.Chinese: 立即派遣抢修队，不惜代价地迅速修复。

TEXT.English: Reckless merchants used hydrogen instead of helium to fill their dirigibles and one has caught fire and crashed in a spectacularly fatal accident.
TEXT.Chinese: 唯利是图的商人使用氢气而非氦气作为填充气体，导致一艘飞艇起火爆炸并坠毁，造成重大人员伤亡。

TEXT.English: The high priest of the temple in %s2_city has placed a large order for our domestically produced incense for use in holy rituals.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city的高级祭司准备大量订购薰香用于举办祭仪。

TEXT.English: Massive snowfall has buried a region of our territory near %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: 深深的积雪几乎将%s2_city完全掩没。

TEXT.English: Open the city granaries and send half the stores to our troubled neighbors.
TEXT.Chinese: 打开我们的粮仓，给陷入困境的邻居提供一半的粮食储备。

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective Trading Company considers to take further actions to enforce its South Asian market position.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective正采取行动，以巩固其在南亚市场的地位。

TEXT.English: Rumors abound that %s1_civ_adjective shipmasters are doing extensive refitting work on their war galley fleet.
TEXT.Chinese: 据报%s1_civ_adjective正对其三层桨战船进行技术改装。

TEXT.English: A perfect storm spawned numerous F5 Class tornadoes, carving a path of destruction across our lands, smashing our %s8_improvement.
TEXT.Chinese: 强烈的飓风横扫了我们的国土，摧毁了我们的%s8_improvement。

TEXT.English: Our gesture of goodwill toward the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has angered %s6_player.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们对%s1_civ_adjective的善意姿态激怒了%s6_player。

TEXT.English: We are too busy to be bothered. Leave the matter to the local authorities. (Revolt may continue)
TEXT.Chinese: 我们太忙了，把这件事交给地方当局吧。（起义可能仍将继续下去）

TEXT.English: How many trees were planted? That's amazing!
TEXT.Chinese: 种植了多少棵树？真是太棒了！

TEXT.English: Then the impeachment should proceed, if that's the people's will.
TEXT.Chinese: 启动弹劾程序，既然这是人民的意愿。

TEXT.English: The thoroughly religious %s1_civ_adjective state is dealing with an outbreak of heresy in some segments of its population.
TEXT.Chinese: 一种异端信仰开始在%s1_civ_adjective的部分地区流行，对正统信仰的统治地位造成冲击。

TEXT.English: Draft an army to establish control.
TEXT.Chinese: 计划建立一支军队。

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have trained a large enough force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariot[COLOR_REVERT] units. Please choose your reward.
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你！你已经拥有了一支强大的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战车[COLOR_REVERT]部队。请选择你的奖励。

TEXT.English: Our scientists have developed better ways of processing coal fuel. Our economy stands ready to benefit from this development.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的科学家发明了更先进的煤炭深加工技术，我们的经济发展将因此受益。

TEXT.English: Fund an effort to preserve these artifacts in museums, accessible only to the most careful scholars.
TEXT.Chinese: 将古籍存放在博物馆中，开放给少数学者进行研究。

TEXT.English: A slave revolt has taken place in %s2_city!
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city发生奴隶暴动！

TEXT.English: When the boom passes, many of the immigrants will settle down.
TEXT.Chinese: 最初的热潮逐渐消退，许多新移民决定在此定居。

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have met the goals of your master blacksmith and built enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] for each for his students to have his own to operate. Please choose a reward from among the benefits your new metalworking empire is able to provide to you.
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你！你已经为煅造大师和他的学徒建造了足够数量的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]煅造场[COLOR_REVERT]，请在“冶金王国”可带来的奖励中选择一项。

TEXT.English: Ignore the heresy.
TEXT.Chinese: 无视异端。

TEXT.English: Fire has destroyed the Theatre in %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city的剧场被大火烧毁。

TEXT.English: Health is the bedrock to world domination! Run full scale tests on all but the youngest and weakest among us.
TEXT.Chinese: 国民健康是国家强盛的基石！针对大部分人群进行临床试验。

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stables[COLOR_REVERT] in your various cities.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you reach the Renaissance Era without having met the conditions.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]要完成这项任务，你必须在本国城市兴建%d1座[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]马厩[COLOR_REVERT]。[PARAGRAPH:1]如果其他文明率先达成目标，或者当你进入启蒙时代仍未达成目标，你的任务将宣告失败。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective Cannon units can now shoot farther and more accurately thanks to improved barrel design.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的工程师改进了炮管设计，大大提升了加农炮的射程和精度。

TEXT.English: With such a large force of Lancers working together, additional training for these units can be achieved.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们应该加强对这支强大骑士部队的训练。

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have met the goals of your religious masters and spread your civilization across the waters. You have completed the quest of The Blessed Sea.
TEXT.Chinese: 祝贺你！你达成了宗教领袖的要求，将文明扩张到了大洋的彼岸。你已完成了“受祝福的海洋”任务。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective ships and planes have disappeared without a trace in the Bermuda Triangle!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的飞机和轮船连续在“百慕大三角”海域神秘失踪。

TEXT.English: A retiring %s1_civ_adjective naval captain has pledged his expertise to assist the Drydock located in %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective海军的一位退休舰长请求到%s2_city的干船坞工作，继续发挥他的才干。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Our %s1_unit will gain the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s2_promotion[COLOR_REVERT] promotion
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]我们的%s1_unit获得[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s2_promotion[COLOR_REVERT]晋升。

TEXT.English: Spread the word of our success and of the blessings of our faith as far and wide as possible.
TEXT.Chinese: 大力宣扬圣战的辉煌功绩，向四方传播我们的信仰。

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective people have constructed what is by far the most deadly fleet of warships in the history of warfare. Their aircraft carrier battle group could crush anything that gets in its way.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective建立了有史以来最强大的现代化海军，他们的航空母舰战斗群能够轻易摧毁任何敌人。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective sales of incense are booming.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的薰香销售量大幅增长。

TEXT.English: A %s5_religion_adjective wedding between one of our citizens and one from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has been honored by a national holiday, including outlandish wedding gifts and donations to our religious institutions. Our people are thrilled by this gesture.
TEXT.Chinese: 通过一场%s5_religion_adjective传统婚礼，一位我国显贵和一位%s1_civ_adjective人结为夫妇。我们的领袖下令举国欢庆，两位新人获赠了许多珍奇的礼物，还有人为此向我们的宗教机构捐款。

TEXT.English: Herbalists have discovered rare and precious plants that grow in abundance only in a certain region near %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: 草药医生发现一种稀有的药用植物在%s2_city附近大量生长。

TEXT.English: Our %s1_civ_adjective religious brothers have gifted us with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT] to aid us in our war effort!
TEXT.Chinese: 同我们一样信奉%s1_civ_adjective的兄弟之邦提供了[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铜[COLOR_REVERT]资源以资助我们的战争！

TEXT.English: The Influenza virus has struck %s1_city.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_city暴发流感。

TEXT.English: While hunting, our %s3_unit has discovered a rich supply of a black oil that burns rather hot.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的%s3_unit在野外狩猎时偶然发现了一种能够炙烈燃烧的黑油。

TEXT.English: An assassin wanted for slaying a %s1_civ_adjective official has been caught fleeing through our land.
TEXT.Chinese: 一名因暗杀%s1_civ_adjective官员而遭该国政府通缉的刺客在我国境内被抓获。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]The Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] receives additional scholars to help boost research.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大图书馆[COLOR_REVERT]带来了额外的科研奖励。

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] Arquebusier[COLOR_REVERT] units.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization is operating in the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vassalage[COLOR_REVERT] civic.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization controls [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you discover [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Replaceable Parts[COLOR_REVERT] without having met the conditions.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]要完成这项任务，你必须训练%d1个[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]火枪手[COLOR_REVERT]单位。[PARAGRAPH:1]如果你的文明实行[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]分封制度[COLOR_REVERT]，将可以获得一个额外奖励选项。[PARAGRAPH:1]如果你的文明拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT]，也可以获得一个额外奖励选项。[PARAGRAPH:1]如果其他文明率先达成目标，或者你在达成目标前获得了训练更先进火器单位的技术（[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]膛线[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]铁路[COLOR_REVERT]），你的任务将宣告失败。

TEXT.English: The worst has occurred! One of our reactors has suffered a nuclear meltdown!
TEXT.Chinese: 最糟糕的事情发生了！我们的一个反应堆发生了核熔毁！

TEXT.English: Parrots make fine pets. We should promote them as one of our trade goods.
TEXT.Chinese: 鹦鹉可以作为宠物，我们应该进行批量销售。

TEXT.English: That's not his job. Sell the statue and remind the blacksmith what his responsibilities are.
TEXT.Chinese: 真是不务正业，卖掉金佛像并敦促他专注于本职工作。

TEXT.English: This is none of our concern.
TEXT.Chinese: 这与我们无关。

TEXT.English: Organize large-scale periodic sporting events in the name of Zeus.
TEXT.Chinese: 以众神之王宙斯的名义定期举办大型综合运动会。

TEXT.English: The Grocer in the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city is becoming renowned for its superior selection, quality and quantity of foodstuffs.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective%s2_city的杂货店以其质量优异、货物充足、品种多样而享誉四方。

TEXT.English: Superb! Have all our military recruits in that city undergo a training regimen at the new academy.
TEXT.Chinese: 太棒了！在那里征召的所有部队都应到军事学院进行训练。

TEXT.English: Leverage our military advantage to persuade the world to ban nuclear weapons.
TEXT.Chinese: 利用我们的军事优势对别国施加影响，推动世界无核化进程。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective farmers continue to suffer loss of their land due to ongoing dust storms sweeping across the plains.
TEXT.Chinese: 由于沙漠化进程的加剧，%s1_civ_adjective的农民推动了大片耕地。

TEXT.English: A %s1_religion_adjective wedding between one of our citizens and one from %s2_civ has been honored by a national holiday by our rivals, including outlandish wedding gifts and donations to their religious institutions. This insult against our religious traditions has outraged our populace. Should we declare a holy war upon the unbelievers?
TEXT.Chinese: 一位我国显贵同一位%s2_civ人按%s1_religion_adjective传统举行了婚礼，对方下令举国欢庆并送来珍奇的礼物，还向他们的宗教机构捐献大笔金钱。他们对我们信仰的侮辱引起了国民的公愤，我们应该向这些异教徒发动圣战吗？

TEXT.English: Hand the material over to our researchers.
TEXT.Chinese: 将这批古籍交给我们的研究人员。

TEXT.English: A great mediator has attempted to broker peace between the %s1_civ_adjective and %s3_adjective Empires!
TEXT.Chinese: 一位中立国领袖提出调停%s1_civ_adjective与%s3_adjective之间的争端，恢复和平！

TEXT.English: A scientific breakthrough at the laboratory in %s2_city is credited in part to the free flow of ideas and information nurtured by the %s1_civ_adjective government.
TEXT.Chinese: 在%s1_civ_adjective政府的大力资助下，%s2_city的实验室获得了一项重大科研突破。

TEXT.English: Fire has raged through a forest near the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjectiv的%s2_city附近发生森林大火。

TEXT.English: Our reactors are safe. Contain the leaks, but there is no need for further action.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的反应堆是安全的。控制泄漏，但无需采取进一步措施。

TEXT.English: In honor of our gods, the city of %s2_city has organized and hosted a grand series of Games. Athletes from all over the nation travel there to compete.
TEXT.Chinese: 为了彰显众神的荣耀，%s2_city举办了一场盛大的综合运动会，全国各地的选手们踊跃参赛。

TEXT.English: Continue to promote reading and writing. Knowledge is power!
TEXT.Chinese: 继续推进文化教育事业，知识就是力量！

TEXT.English: Harness the fervor of the believers to construct a Holy Shrine to honor the sacred sites where our faith was born.
TEXT.Chinese: 将狂热的信徒们组织起来，在我们神圣信仰的诞生地建造一座圣坛。

TEXT.English: Rumors that a spirit angel of mercy is watching over the patients in the hospital in %s2_city are leading many devout believers to seek treatment there.
TEXT.Chinese: 据传%s2_city的市立医院有天使保佑，大批信徒涌向那里接受治疗。

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build a total of %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] in your various cities. This may include Forges already completed.[PARAGRAPH:1]The master smith is a religious man. An additional reward option will be available if your civilization has a state religion if and when the quest is completed successfully.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, if you lose control over %s2_city and the master smith, or if you reach the Renaissance Era without having met the conditions.
TEXT.Chinese: [PARAGRAPH:1]要完成这项任务，你必须在本国城市建造%d1座[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]煅造场[COLOR_REVERT]（已建成的包括在内）。[PARAGRAPH:1]这位煅造大师非常虔信宗教。如果你的文明设立了官方信仰，则在完成任务时可以获得一个额外奖励选项。[PARAGRAPH:1]如果其他文明率先达成目标，或者当你失去了煅造大师所定居的城市%s2_city，或者当你进入进入启蒙时代仍未达成目标，你的任务将宣告失败。

TEXT.English: Radiation leaks have been discovered in the reactor of the Nuclear Plant in the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: 在 %s1_civ_adjective 城市 %s2_city 的核电站反应堆中发现了辐射泄漏。

TEXT.English: Our engineers have conceived a national highway system of divided highways free of all traffic stops, built in straight lines on smooth grades.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的工程师完成了多车道、全封闭、全立交的现代化国家公路网设计。

TEXT.English: Fund the establishment of contracted harbors out of our treasury.
TEXT.Chinese: 从我们的国库中出资建设承包港口。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Receive [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%D1[COLOR_REVERT] attitude from all leaders
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]所有领袖对你的态度[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%D1[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: The extra patients will enhance city revenue.
TEXT.Chinese: 大批求医者将增加城市收入。

TEXT.English: The Master Blacksmith[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by the master blacksmith to build enough new [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] to provide acceptable working environments for all the students to whom he intends to pass on his trade secrets.
TEXT.Chinese: “煅造大师”任务[PARAGRAPH:1]一位煅造大师请你完成一项任务：建造足够数量的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]煅造场[COLOR_REVERT]以便为他的众多学徒提供良好的训练和工作环境。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]The virus spreads to some nearby cities and reduces their population by %d1
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]疫情传播导致周围城市人口减少%d1级。

TEXT.English: Our ship captains gain extra experience, enabling them to better navigate.
TEXT.Chinese: 为我们的船长积累更多的经验，提升海军整体素质。

TEXT.English: Send a blackops group to destroy the radio tower, we can blame it on an industrial accident.
TEXT.Chinese: 派遣特工破坏他们的广播塔，并将原因归结为一次工业事故。

TEXT.English: Our horse trainers believe that it would be possible to gain a much deeper bond with and understanding of our riding animals.[PARAGRAPH:1]They require a larger and more coordinated network of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stables[COLOR_REVERT] to pursue this goal.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的驯马师相信骑手与马匹之间可以进一步增进相互了解，建立牢固的感情纽带。[PARAGRAPH:1]为实现这一目标，他们要求在各个城市兴建设施完善的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]马厩[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: Imported %s1_civ_adjective tea has become all the rage amongst our social elite.
TEXT.Chinese: 自%s1_civ_adjective进口的茶饮料已成为我国社会精英阶层热烈追捧的时尚饮品。

TEXT.English: Massive civil unrest near %s4_city has led to riots and looting. Both inside and outside the city, some of our improvements have been destroyed by looters.
TEXT.Chinese: %s4_city附近发生骚乱和抢掠事件。许多建筑和设施遭到破坏。

TEXT.English: We cannot afford to spend gold on this problem. Leave the matter to the local authorities.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们无法继续在此领域投入资金，让当地官员自行处理。

TEXT.English: There is really not much we can do about this, is there?
TEXT.Chinese: 对此我们无能为力，不是吗？

TEXT.English: An innovative chef has discovered a new type of spice, which grows only in a forest near %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: 一位厨师发现了一种新香料，这种香料仅出产于%s2_city附近的森林。

TEXT.English: A %s5_religion_adjective wedding between one of our citizens and one from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has angered our people. Our rivals have granted no special gifts or attention, though, so our people are merely grumbling and fuming.
TEXT.Chinese: 一位我国显贵和一位%s1_civ_adjective人按%s5_religion_adjective传统举行的婚礼激起了我国人民的愤怒。不过对方国家并未采取挑衅行动，相信我们的人民也不会有更过激的反应。

TEXT.English: Our game designers have developed a new addictive game of Civilization. How shall we proceed?
TEXT.Chinese: 我国的游戏设计师开发了一款令人上瘾的全新电脑游戏——《文明》，对此我们应作何反应？

TEXT.English: A careless cigarette smoker started a fire at the Theatre in %s2_city, during which the building was destroyed and numerous patrons died.
TEXT.Chinese: 一位粗心的烟民在%s2_city的剧场引发了一场火灾，剧场被烧毁，许多观众被烧死。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective crab cake sales are booming.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的蟹肉饼销售量大幅增长。

TEXT.English: The art and sculpture decorating the %s5_building in %s2_city has nurtured the imagination and talents of a new Great Artist!
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city的%s5_building中的壁画和雕塑激发了一位年轻的大艺术家的想象力和创造力。

TEXT.English: The rescue and recovery efforts are best handled by the locals.
TEXT.Chinese: 组织当地居民进行清理。

TEXT.English: Our agents have been exposed!
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的间谍被发现了！

TEXT.English: Our King is the State!
TEXT.Chinese: 国王即国家！

TEXT.English: Our people are thriving in peace time.
TEXT.Chinese: 我国进入欣欣向荣的和平时代。

TEXT.English: Our herbalists have discovered a new plant that holds great promise for health treatments. However, tests on human subjects are required to find the right mixture.
TEXT.Chinese: 我国草药医生发现了一种新的药用植物，对多种疾病具有极佳的疗效。但确定最佳配方还需要进行大量临床试验。

TEXT.English: Our generals request that we focus on making guns. These are the weapons of the future![PARAGRAPH:1]If we train enough [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Arquebusier[COLOR_REVERT] units, we should be able to command any battlefield.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的军事将领要求大量生产火枪，这是属于未来世界的武器！[PARAGRAPH:1]如果我们训练了足够数量的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]火枪手[COLOR_REVERT]单位，我们就能支配任何战场。

TEXT.English: A priest from %s2_city is doubting the supreme power of Amun-Re.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city的一位祭司质疑传统神灵的至尊地位。

TEXT.English: Vicious tornadoes carved a path of destruction through the %s1_civ_adjective Empire.
TEXT.Chinese: 强烈的飓风横扫%s1_civ_adjective，沿途留下一片废墟。

TEXT.English: Set up a monument at the airport to produce tourism.
TEXT.Chinese: 在当地机场建造一座纪念碑以吸引游客。

TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of the Corporate Expansion!
TEXT.Chinese: 你没能完成“商业扩张”任务！

TEXT.English: Unacceptable. An "accident" should happen to the traitor!
TEXT.Chinese: 绝不能宽恕叛国行为，给他安排一场意外“事故”。

TEXT.English: A medicinal tea cultivated by locals has been found to be effective with treating illnesses. This tea grows only in a specific region near %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: 生长于%s2_city附近一种茶树被发现极具治疗功效，成为当地独有的特产。

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective armies have completed their Crusade, wresting control of the Holy City of %s2_city away from the %s4_civ_adjective people!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的军队发动了一场圣战，从%s4_civ_adjective异教徒手中夺取了圣城%s2_city。

TEXT.English: A warlord from %s2_city has made a generous contribution to his community.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city的一位军事首领以实际行动慷慨地回报家乡父老！

TEXT.English: There are riots taking place near the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s6_city. Our agents stand ready to add fuel to these fires, to stir up additional trouble.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective的%s6_city附近发生骚乱。我们派往该处的间谍提议火上浇油，制造更大的麻烦。

TEXT.English: The mass transit system in %s2_city has implemented a city-wide program of using fuel additives to reduce pollution and improve on maintenance costs and fuel efficiency.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_city的公交系统开始推广使用新型燃油添加剂，以减少污染、节约成本并提升燃油效率。

TEXT.English: Money changers have flocked to the Market in the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city, attracting all manner of customers in need of changing one nation's currency for another's.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective%s2_city的市场中聚集了大批货币兑换商，为各国顾客提供货币兑换业务。

TEXT.English: A joyous marriage in the %s3_religion_adjective tradition has forged new bonds between %s1_civ_adjective and %s4_civ_adjective peoples, who both adore the new couple and are pleased with the behavior of the inlaws from the other nation.
TEXT.Chinese: 一场遵照%s3_religion_adjective传统进行的婚姻在%s1_civ_adjective和%s4_civ_adjective人民之间建立了新的纽带，双方都很欣赏这对新人，乐于接纳来自外国的亲家。

TEXT.English: Discover and decipher lost knowledge from within some of the literature.
TEXT.Chinese: 通过研究经典文学宝库寻找并破解失传的远古科技。

TEXT.English: Greed[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your military leaders to seize control of that resource.
TEXT.Chinese: “贪婪的欲望”任务[PARAGRAPH:1]你的军事领袖要求夺取一处资源的控制权。
